table.name: vtiger_servicerequests
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicerequests` ( `servicerequestsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sr_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `sr_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `servicerequestsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicerequestsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_servicerequestscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicerequestscf` ( `servicerequestsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicerequestsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
